Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 10th overall pick, by Malibu in 1978...
Injured on 4/15/1978 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Injured on 7/5/1979 with a Strained Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 3-4 weeks...
Injured on 6/3/1980 with a Torn Ligament Elbow, out for full season...
Earned first career win on 6/15/1984...
Had first career hit on 8/22/1984, off Estanis Diaz (PG)...
Injured on 5/6/1986 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 5/1/1989, going 4-1, 1.48...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Plum Grove on 5/24/1989, striking out 6...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1991, going 3-0, 0.97...
Was selected to the 1992 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1992, winning 2 games with a 0.54 ERA...
